newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Light still a Fator hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Light still a Fator hold.

text.p: -- Fator Securities said in a report it maintained its hold rating on Brazil's private power distributor Light.
-- It said it based its recommendation on the large number of Light shares held by Brazil's National Development Bank BNDES.
-- "As these (shares) are due to be sold in the short term, the trading price is bound to be affected," it said.
-- Light's restructruring program aimed at cutting workforce, increasing productivity and improving competitiveness should boost profits in the near future, it added.
-- Light operates in the densely populated Rio de Janeiro region with 95 percent of consumer market in its concession area.
-- Light common shares were up 4.78 percent at 369 reais.
